print a message to user, then accept a user's input, finally return the input as a String value.

Create an object with default constructor.
CoordinateGenerator(int, int) - 类 CoordinateGenerator 的构造方法
Create an object with given numbers which indicate its range.

Create a object with default constructor.
FileIO(String) - 类 FileIO 的构造方法
Create a object with non-default constructor.

G

Game - <Unnamed> 中的 类
The main class to execute the game named Battleship with a Twist.The aim of Battleship with a Twist is for a player to try and destroy all of the computer opponents ships before the computer destroys all of the players ships placed on the playing grid.
Game() - 类 Game 的构造方法
Create a ShipList with default constructor for both player and computer.
Game(ShipList, ShipList) - 类 Game 的构造方法
Create a ShipList with given shiplist objects for both player and computer.
getmaxmumValue() - 类 CoordinateGenerator 中的方法
Get the maximum value.
getminimumValue() - 类 CoordinateGenerator 中的方法
Get the minimum value.
getnoOfHitsMade() - 类 Ship 中的方法
Get the number of hits taken by ship.
getnoOfHitsNeeded() - 类 Ship 中的方法
Get the number of hits needed to destory a ship.
getNumberOfShips() - 类 ShipList 中的方法
Get the number of ships stored in this shiplist.
getRandomNumber() - 类 CoordinateGenerator 中的方法
Get a ramdon number.
getShipByIndex(int) - 类 ShipList 中的方法
Get a ship object using its index.
getShipList() - 类 ShipList 中的方法
Get a list of ships.
getshipName() - 类 Ship 中的方法
Get the name of the ship.
getxPos() - 类 Ship 中的方法
Get the x coordinate of the ship.
getyPos() - 类 Ship 中的方法
Get the y coordinate of the ship.

I

ifWin(ArrayList<Ship>) - 类 ShipList 中的方法
Check the state of the shiplist, and therefore to tell the result if the player or the computer is win this game.

Ship - <Unnamed> 中的 类
A simple modle of a ship.The Ship class will specify the attributes and behaviours of all ships within the game.
Ship() - 类 Ship 的构造方法
Create a Ship with default constructor.
Ship(String, int, int, int, int) - 类 Ship 的构造方法
Create a Ship with non-default constructor.
ShipList - <Unnamed> 中的 类
A simple modle of a list of ships.The ShipList class will specify the attributes and behaviours of all the ships within the game.
ShipList() - 类 ShipList 的构造方法
Create a ShipList with default constructor.
ShipList(ArrayList<Ship>) - 类 ShipList 的构造方法
Create a ShipList with non-default constructor.
start() - 类 Game 中的方法
The main method to start the game.It would display the settings in the "gamesettings.txt" file.
stringsLengthWithinRange(String, int, int) - 类 Validation 中的方法
Check if the length of input is between the minimun number and the maximun number.
